metadata.title: USN-6359-1 -- file vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that file incorrectly handled certain malformed files. An attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6359-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libmagic-dev - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1 libmagic-mgc - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1 libmagic1 - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1 file - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
